item.title: Changing exp rates in a 724 private server
item.dc:creator: @sephirothant sephirothant
item.description:
@sephirothant wrote:

public static final int XP_RATE = 1; // x75 for combat, x50 for skills
public static final int SKILLING_XP_RATE = 50;
public static final int COMBAT_XP_RATE = 75;
public static final int AIR_GUITAR_MUSICS_COUNT = 50;

its says that in source original but when i try change to
public static final int XP_RATE = 0.45; // x75 for combat, x50 for skills

i get errors

please help me lower the exp rate

thanks seph
